meanings.definition: Situated or occurring between layers or laminae.
meanings.sent1: The interlaminar space in the bookshelf allows for extra storage.
meanings.sent2: The interlaminar connection between the floors made the building stronger.
meanings.sent3: The interlaminar sandwich was so thick, it was hard to take a bite!
meanings.sent4: The interlaminar relationship between the two characters added depth to the story.
meanings.sent5: The interlaminar bond between the siblings was unbreakable.

meanings.definition: Relating to or involving the space between layers or laminae.
meanings.sent1: The interlaminar design of the fabric made it breathable.
meanings.sent2: The interlaminar area between the glass panes allowed for insulation.
meanings.sent3: The interlaminar pattern on the wallpaper created a unique optical illusion.
meanings.sent4: The interlaminar concept of the art piece symbolized unity within diversity.
meanings.sent5: The interlaminar structure of the bridge provided stability during the storm.
